alert.note: Alert for Rush (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 08 at 4:30PM EDT until June 08 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL RUSH COUNTY... At 430 PM EDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Rushville, or 15 miles west of Connersville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Emergency management confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Rush County. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
